data.title: Areas at Risk of Coastal Erosion
data.description: Polygons representing land areas at risk from future shoreline retreat, based on combined accretion/erosion and sea level rise trends.

table:columns.name: transect_id
table:columns.description: Unique identifier for each transect, constructed from coastline, segment, and distance (from GCTR).

table:columns.name: rcp
table:columns.description: Representative Concentration Pathway.

table:columns.name: ssp
table:columns.description: Shared Socioeconomic Pathway.

table:columns.name: datetime
table:columns.description: Projection datetime.

table:columns.name: shoreline_change_ac
table:columns.description: Sample-wise shoreline change from accretion/erosion.

table:columns.name: shoreline_change_slr
table:columns.description: Sample-wise shoreline change from sea level rise.

table:columns.name: shoreline_change_total
table:columns.description: Sample-wise total shoreline change (accretion + slr).

table:columns.name: shoreline_change_ac_p50
table:columns.description: Median accretion-based shoreline change.

table:columns.name: shoreline_change_slr_p50
table:columns.description: Median sea level rise-based shoreline change.

table:columns.name: shoreline_change_total_p50
table:columns.description: Median total projected shoreline change.

table:columns.name: shoreline_change_total_p10
table:columns.description: 10th percentile of total shoreline change.

table:columns.name: shoreline_change_total_p90
table:columns.description: 90th percentile of total shoreline change.

table:columns.name: geometry
table:columns.description: Projected shoreline position as EPSG:4326 Point geometry.

table:columns.name: lon
table:columns.description: Longitude coordinate of the transect origin (from GCTR).

table:columns.name: lat
table:columns.description: Latitude coordinate of the transect origin (from GCTR).

table:columns.name: bbox
table:columns.description: Bounding box of the transect geometry, defined by min/max longitude and latitude (from GCTR).

table:columns.name: common_region_name
table:columns.description: Common name of the region where the transect is located (from GCTR).

table:columns.name: country
table:columns.description: ISO alpha-2 country code for the transect's location (from GCTR).

table:columns.name: utm_epsg
table:columns.description: EPSG code representing the UTM CRS of the transect (from GCTR).

table:columns.name: sds:change_rate
table:columns.description: Rate of shoreline change (m/year) derived from satellite-derived shorelines (from GCTR).

table:columns.name: sds:reference_lon
table:columns.description: Longitude coordinate of the reference shoreline observation (from GCTR).

table:columns.name: sds:reference_lat
table:columns.description: Latitude coordinate of the reference shoreline observation (from GCTR).

table:columns.name: sds:reference_datetime
table:columns.description: Reference datetime for the baseline shoreline position (from GCTR).
